title: Powerful Quake Hits Nepal; Death Toll Rising
teaser: An estimated 7.8-magnitude earthquake shook Nepal on Saturday. It's being described as the strongest to hit the country in 81 years. NPR's Scott Simon talks to Kunda Dixit, editor at the Nepali Times.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
